评论概述: Comfortable blouse and very feminine fit
评论详情: I ordered this blouse to go with a crimson skirt, also purchased on Amazon. It is very comfortable and fits great. It is a nice cream color, and the shirt is tailored to give a nice feminine look. I would purchase this blouse again.

Shirt is very nice, the material is soft, but thin. So make sure you're wearing a nude brazier underneath. The sleeves are absolutely beautiful, just as pictured only better. Shirt fits smaller in the waist area so if you are heavy set I'd size up, if you are smaller like me in the waist, you'll be fine. It holds up very well in the wash on normal cycle and medium heat. I've washed it more than 10 times, haven't lost any buttons so great job there. Zero wrinkles!!!

I bought this shirt for a Halloween costume. It looks nice and it fits well but I will say that the fabric is a lot more sheer in person. It’s not see through but it has a slight sheerness to it I hadn’t expected from the photos. Regardless it worked just fine it didn’t expose any part of me and the material is nice and soft. I would just say that the sleeves don’t hold their shape very well plus the slight sheer look. Just wish it was a little better made but you get what you pay for and it’s a fine shirt.
I bought this shirt for the style. However, it did not fit right and was not flattering to me. I ended up returning the shirt. May want to order a larger size if you are heavy chested.
The fit is perfect. Excellent quality. Absolutely beautiful. Just as shown in the image.
Perfect fit for 1940s top.

My daughter attends a school with uniforms. this blouse was cute and fit very well. Feels like great material that will last. The design is really cute on the sleeves .
This is true to size and goes well with several of my skirts.
The color is flattering on all of our family members, and the shirt has a pretty shape. It washed well too.
This top is very classy and cute. It has a vintage look to the design that is really cool and adds character to outfits. Love it!
I love this shirt!  The color is exactly as it appears in the ad.  It doesn't wrinkle, has great lines & a perfect fit.  Great dressed up or down, I feel like a million bucks in it!

Love that the fabric is not thick and the sleeves kind of a leaf look. A little big for my figure but is ok. Love the light-yellow sunny color. The only thing is since the fabric is light you can kind see the bra, will have to wear a cami inside.

评论概述: Your summer top is here sis!
评论详情: First off I am busty and petite so that makes a challenge to avoid the dreaded boob button gap with button up shirts. But this one fits so well and the fabric is so light it is so perfect for hot summer days. The white is a bit sheer but that’s a worthy price to pay for an airy top. And the sleeves are adorable.
This Blouse is so lightweight and stylish. I can dress it up with dress pants or down with biker shorts. It looks great either way.
Very nice blouse. Seems well made. Beware: wine red is much more a dark-ish red than the maroon bordereau color in the picture.

This blouse is so cute!! I have received several compliments on just the first time wearing it. It is fitted but not tight and has some give to the fabric, so it is very comfortable. The sleeve is super cute and a flattering design rather than a straight sleeve.
Nice fabric, fit was spot on.  I love it
This white short sleeved button down blouse is lovely. It fits beautifully. It’s well made and the tulip sleeve is a nice design detail.
may be a little bigger than sizing
Didn't look as good on myself as in the photo; the size also wasn't exact. Just looked frumpy

This is very comfortable and im able to move in it with ease. It is very cute and professional and I bought a skirt as well from this company to go with it. Overall very pleased with this purchase and i plan on buying from this company again.

This beautiful shirt is such a wonderful surprise. The craftsmanship is so special. It reminds me of my mother’s sewing. The tucks at the top of the sleeves, the a-line body, the petal sleeves and the nice weight of the fabric makes this an A+ item. Perfect medium fit as it skims your body. Wear tucked in or over skirts and pants. The pink is a soft shell pink. Lovely shirt!
Super cute shirt. Very light and perfect for summer! Love the brand!

评论概述: I want to love it, but…
评论详情: Nice stylish shirt purchase for office wear… unfortunately the button keep popping open around the bust and I have small ones so it’s not a size issue. Wish this wasn’t a problem.

I like the retro style of this blouse so much! The fit is flattering on my plus-size, large-busted frame with no button gap (see photo). And the sleeves are roomy enough for those of us with larger arms. That being said, the cut will work on just about anyone. I love the flattering pink color, and the fabric is cool, crisp, and low maintenance.  I have styled this blouse with a suit for work, and with capris pants, red lipstick, and ballet flats for a casual retro look. It’s a definite win!
Loved it and very well made

Belle Poque Summer Short Sleeve Button Down Blouse for Women V Neck Vintage Business Casual Shirts Tops This is a great shirt. The fabric is more solid, less flimsy, there’s no sheerness at all. The shirt has a retro feel, and my wife loves it however it does not fit to size for her - the top is definitely roomy. My wife loved the fact that the shirt was fitted around the waist, but, again, the shirt is too big for her. She followed the size chart. She loves this brand, Belle Poque, and just because this didn’t fit her correctly, she will still purchase clothing from this brand.
Beautifully light weight and tailored but very thin and needs a cami under.
Very comfortable to wear all day at work

This fits so well!  I always order one size up from my regular size in something like this that doesn't stretch much.  Usual med, ordered large.  Beautiful princess seams!  Wonderful fit through the body. Even looks surprisingly decent untucked.  Cute puffed sleeves.  The fabric is very slick and synthetic but it actually feels really nice and I'm someone who usually hates synthetics.  Very well-made.  good quality.  flattering. My only problem is that I hate the collar. it’s very clunky and cheap looking. it needs more structure. It just kind of lays flat and it’s really wide and big and looks awkward. The proportions are off. This is so close to being a great find, but the collar ruins it for me.
I love this button down white shirt. It’s really comfortable and pairs nicely with jeans, dress pants, or anything else I have already, I highly recommend it!

Very structured but remarkable in its comfort, this is a beautiful top. It's authentic enough to fit into a Victorian style costume, but far better when worn as a modern anachronism to dress up a pair of jeans.

A beautiful and flattering top with a gorgeous color. The quality and design are great and the fitting is nice. The look is elegant and can provide such a professional look and yet it is relax and cool. It is great for work and for daily wear. Fit any style such as casual or dressy. Great value for the money and it is such a beautiful color on the top of that.

评论概述: Size up if you have a larger chest
评论详情: I really love this blouse. Most of the blouses I have seen lately are more of the straight cut. This blouse is curved in as pictured to give a more defined shape . The soft pink and curved cut gives a very feminine look. I would recommend sizing up if you have a larger chest. The shirt gapped slightly on me. I was able to correct with a safety pin without any distortion being noticed.

This blouse is great for either work, a date, or whatever. Can dress up or down depending on the event. The fabric is wonderful, not too light but not heavy either. It machine washes/dries without a wrinkle. The best part - it is very flattering. The shirt really accentuates your waist. Not many shirts do that these days. Very nice shirt.

评论概述: Retro top is a fun twist on a work shirt
评论详情: Ordered this white shirt to wear with my collection of vests/sweater vests.  Works well both with and without a vest.🪶 FABRIC: Super soft and comfortable.  Lightweight material.👗 FIT: No gap in the bust, has a waist, comfortable fit.  The only issue is with the sleeves, which looks super cute in the model photos, but it might take a little fussing to get them to lay down right.  Ordered a large, and usually wear a large (good fit)
This is a nice lightweight top for spring and summer that looks great dressed up or down. The quality is excellent and the fit is true to size and very flattering.
REeally cute top.  Nice color, high quality.

评论概述: Retro, work appropriate, and no bust gape!
评论详情: My wife says, "I rarely wear button-front shirts or blouses because I'm self-conscious about the tendency of these styles to gape over the bust between the buttons. I expected that to be a problem with this blouse, but was happily surprised to find it wasn't. I guess they did a better job than most of positioning the buttons. Sorry, I didn't steam it before taking the photos."

This is a very pretty blouse. It fits great, even in the chest where I usually have gaping. I don't like the sleeve style as much as I thought I would, but that is just a personal preference. The shirt is flattering and fits great, is light-weight and comfortable. I got the size large and it fits perfectly. For reference, I wear a size 10/12 usually, or size Medium US size, weigh 175-lbs give or take a few, have a 36C chest and size 32-34" waist.

The fabric has a very weird feel to it (almost like a stretchy rayon, which maybe it is). Whatever the composition, the fabric also tends to cling to less flattering areas (like showing how my bra band slightly digs into my back). However, it is decently comfortable and the style is cute.

This top has a sweet minimalistic look that  has a smart stylish appeal to it.  It’s made very well; the fit is perfect; and the petal style sleeves are just so classic!  This top will look great with high waisted skirts, trousers or jeans.  This top can be dressed up or down and will look fantastic either way!

This is a very soft lightweight casual button down shirt.  I really like the smaller feminine collar and the slightly puffy sleeves.It has a very flattering v-neck design. It is somewhat thin but high quality and not see through at all. The size chart is accurate and it fits great.

评论概述: Good Attempt at a Nice Shirt
评论详情: This shirt is mostly good.  The material is average, there's an attempt at tailoring, and the stitching isn't loose/missing/etc (as is often the case with fast fashion).  The only issue is that the sleeves are weird.  I think they tried to save some material by skimping on the shoulder and upper torso area and attaching the sleeves too close together, particularly at the back.  As a result, the shirt pulls taut at the bust and shoulders, while flowing a bit too loose in the lower back area.  The person trying the shirt is correctly sized per the size chart, and all components fit individually, but the way it's assembled is a little "off."  Still, it's at least as good as anything you'd pick up at a fast fashion in person retail store and presents a solid value.

She says it curves in the correct locations. It matches the vintage style, but she can still wear to work. For a petite girl, it's a tad long, but nothing that would deter her from buying this again in another color. I would go up a size if you are choosing a size as it does have a lot of elasticity. Which at first she wasn't a fan of, but she grew to like eventually.

I love this top so much that I wore the same day I gotbit. It is very figure flattering. The fabric is soft in a semi silk way, It is flowy.  I love the tulip cap sleeves, so cute. I really live the shade if pink. I will be wearing this top allot

I have nothing like this in my wardrobe. I thought it would be cute with jeans to add a different look for myself.  Mine was very wrinkled when I took it out. I believe the soft lightweight material will wash nicely and not wrinkle on me. This will really be great in the hot months because of the sheerness. I got mine in white and I can see part of my bra which I don't mind. A camisole or something will help cover yours if it is something you are self conscious about or have a young lady wearing it.  The buttons are sewn on sturdy and the rest of the stitching on it is well done.  The sleeves details are really so cute. I got a small and I'm a 4-6 120 pounds with a 34C cup size. This fits perfectly with room for me. I just adore this top.

I was looking for a top that will go with the skirt so I ordered this one. This top is cute and looks elegant.  I liked its short-sleeved style. It is comfortable and fitting is good. It is see-through so needs an extra layer underneath.
Great quality garment this runs true to size but is fitted. Size up if you are top heavy.

评论概述: Very cute and vintage looking, but I don’t love the material
评论详情: The details on this blouse are so cute—the collar, the overlapping sleeves, and the way the darts are sewn. It washes nicely and the wrinkles are smoothened out with the wash. I don’t love the fabric that it’s made of. It’s 95% polyester and 5% elastane, so it’s soft, but the material doesn’t feel the best. I got the color white and it’s slightly sheer.

Looks fantastic, fits like a dream. I adore the way the sleeves overlap, giving it a lovely retro look. This is a perfect shirt for work, classy and stylish. It's super well-made as well, very fitted and flattering.

I love everything about this blouse.  How it's fitted for a lady's curvy shape, the soft and comfy fabric (95% polyester, 5% elastane), the tulip sleeves, etc.  As shown in the pics, it will need some ironing before I wear it out, but that's no big deal.  It does need to be hand washed--which isn't convenient--but it's worth it to have a classy, flattering, white blouse that you can wear for business or leisure. The buttons are very easy to work and securely sewn on.  Fits true to size--I'd ordered large and it fits perfectly.  I'd love to have a pink one as well, so I might order another in that color.  Definitely worth the listing price.

For years, I’ve looked around for fitted blouses for plus size girls, and often times. They just aren’t cut properly and are very unflattering.  This shirt is not like that the cap sleeves have a little overlay like flower petals which is really beautiful and I love the way the seams are done which also creates a nice illusion  The line is underneath both breasts, which allows the blouse to have a more fitted look  The material has some flexibility so that it is forgiving and it is plus size inclusive Me being a size 16/18. It hung on me perfectly.  I also like the button placement it didn’t feel like there was a button above and below my breast there’s actually a button holding the shirt closed in between.  Price point is perfect fit is perfect and the white is true white all the way around a five star blouse  Definitely a great ad for your closet

I am 5’7”, about 170 lbs, with measurements of 38-30-42. I usually wear a large. The large fit nicely. If your are bustier you may want to go up a size. The shirt feels nice on the skin and seems well made. I would wash on delicate and hang to dry.

This is a really beautiful and well made shirt. It's a little on the heavier side material wise, but it is still pretty light. Might be too heavy for summer, but would be perfect for fall or spring. It has a flattering cut, but is still work appropriate
